summary: Envy Heart 4
title: Envy Heart 4
body:
Envy Hearts Summary (Peter x Reader; daddy!Tony x daughter! Reader; Loki x Killmonger x Hela x Reader): Being a Stark means your rich and you have a father who doesn’t have time for you. Y/N grew up craving for a father’s love. She always thought that her dad just doesn’t know how to show emotions. But her beliefs changed when she saw how supportive Tony is to her classmate Peter. They are like father and son. She hated her father so much she join side with Loki, Killmonger, and Hela. Can Tony and Peter save Y/N? Or will they end up seeing each other on a battlefield?


Previously

“Mr. Park you were guilty of raping 4 high school students” you looked at the evidence in the folder.

“I’m innocent! I was freed by the court!” the criminal insisted “don’t play God!”.

You turned around and looked at Loki who was smirking “he is a God, a God of Mischief”.

“Last chance” Loki warned the criminal.

“Fine! I raped them” he began to cry “please don’t kill me”.

He tried to touch you but Loki kicked him “those girls that you raped begged as well. What made you think we will listen?”

You grabbed something from your pocket and inject it to the man “I specially made that poison to criminals like you. First, you will have problems breathing, next your visions will get blurred. Your organs will fail one by one and you will die”.

“Please don’t” the man begged.

You kicked him and left the voice recorder where he admitted his crimes.

When you left the place you received a call from Killmonger that your father was on his way.

“It’s time” you informed Loki.

Killmonger looked at Hela “do we really have to do this?” he asked.

“Y/N wants Winter Soldier in our team” Hela smirked “let’s give her what she wants”.

—Few hours ago—

“Hela can you turn Bucky back into Winter Soldier” you asked the Goddess of Death “like how Loki controlled Clint?”

“Why?” Hela curiously asked.

“Well, first I want him in our team. He was nice to me, he used to look after me when I was in the tower. Second, he is Steve’s weakness” you smiled innocently at them.

She smiled back at you “of course. We will get him for you”.

—Present Time—

“We found Loki and Y/N” Black Widow informed everyone.

“Nobody touches my brother” Thor warned everyone “I will talk to him”.

“Don’t hurt Y/N” Tony added.

“Avoid hurting them at all cost” T'Challa ordered “Erik is my cousin, I will bring him to Wakanda alive”.

“Mr Stark I saw Y/N” Peter called the attention of your father “I’m following her”.

“I’m on my way” Tony left everyone.

You wore your Iron Man suit and flew away. However, Spiderman managed to capture you with his web.

Before Tony arrived Loki put the little spider into an illusion that he created.

“Y/N” your father called you “it’s me”.

“I know who you are, father” at the moment you got freed from the web you flew away from him.

You flew faster than him and you started to shoot him but he just followed you.

Behind your mask, you were crying. You should be mad at him, right? He hurt you before that’s why you left. But why are you hurting when you’re shooting him? Why are you scared that he might get hurt? Why do you want to protect him from the monster he created?

“Y/N!” Tony called your name.

He was surprised when you turned to the God of Mischief.

“Where is my daughter?” he asked.

Loki huffed “daughter? You are really funny. She is nothing but disappointment to you, right? Pretending to be a loving father?”

“Shut up!” Tony shot Loki.

It was too late when he realized that it was an illusion. He shot you and you were falling fast.

He flew as fast as he can to catch you. The Winter Soldier caught you in his arms. He was flying with Hela and Killmonger.

“Bucky” Tony called his name “give me my daughter! Give me Y/N!”

Loki set Peter free from the illusion he created for him to witness everything.

“Mr. Stark” the boy looked at Iron Man and the Executioners.

Bucky removed your mask and let Tony saw you face “how pitiful, she was killed by her own father” Hela sighed.

“Shut up! I’ll kill all of you” Tony was about to shoot them again but Loki used his powers to teleport you back to your secret place.

“Mr. Stark!” Peter called his attention.

T'Challa and the others found Tony floating and not saying anything.

Tony didn’t say a word on their way back to the Tower.

“Tell me what happened” Steve ordered.

Peter looked down and Steve looked at Tony “Stark, tell me what happened”.

“I killed Y/N! I killed my own daughter! I killed her! I killed her with my hands!” Tony shouted “I killed my daughter” he sobbed.

Nat rubbed his back while he was crying “Loki tricked me. I thought I was talking to Loki then I shoot him but it was Y/N. It’s my Y/N” he cried.

T'Challa approached Fury “are you happy? You give us an order to get them dead or alive even if you know that they are a family member?”

“We are just protecting the lives of innocent people” Fury insisted.

“You’re saying that a murderer is an innocent? A rapist is innocent?” T'Challa asked.

“There is a proper way to settle things” Agent Hill sided with Fury.

“So that’s why those criminals got freed? Is this what you call justice? If your thinking that those criminals are worth to protect them maybe I’m in the wrong side” the king of Wakanda left them.

“How is she?” Bucky asked Hela.

“She is sleeping” she answered.

“I can’t believe that you come on your own” Killmonger smirked, “it’s surprising”.

“I need to protect Y/N from all of you” Bucky looked at the three.

Loki walked behind him “you’re one of us. A monster”.

“This is where you belong Sgt Barnes” Killmonger added, “you killed innocent people for Hydra but it’s time for you to make things right”.

“You’re not different from Hydra” Bucky glared at Killmonger.

“You come here on your own will” Loki reminded him and he gave him a bunch of folders “we always do a further investigation about the criminals that we kill”.

“Didn’t you know? We always left a recorder in the crime scene?” Hela added, “where they confess everything”.

Your room was too dark. You never let a single light come in.

“I’m always wondering why your room is always dark like this” you heard a familiar voice, it was Bucky.

“I feel calm in the dark” you told him.

“But you can’t see anything” you can feel that he didn’t move from where he was standing “we are so worried about you”.

“They are nice” you started “they are just misunderstood and unloved”.

He remain silent for a while “you can go back to the tower if you want”.

“I will stay here, I will protect you” Bucky insisted.

“You will go against Steve?” you asked him.

“I believe I will go against the criminals” he corrected your words “how are you feeling?”

“My body aches but my heart bleeds” you honestly answered his question.

You conversation got interrupted by a knock on the door.

“Bucky, Y/N. You may want to go out we have a visitor” Hela informed you.

You sat down and turned on the lamp beside your bed. Bucky looked puzzled and so where you.

Tony was in your room, staring at your picture that was displayed on your desk.

“Y/N, I’m sorry” he covered his face while sobbing “your dad is a monster”.

Part 5

“I need to protect Y/N from all of you” Bucky looked at the three.

“You’re not different from Hydra” Bucky glared at Killmonger.

Your room was too dark. You never let a single light come in.

“I’m always wondering why your room is always dark like this” you heard a familiar voice, it was Bucky.

“I feel calm in the dark” you told him.

“But you can’t see anything” you can feel that he didn’t move from where he was standing “we are so worried about you”.

“They are nice” you started “they are just misunderstood and unloved”.

He remain silent for a while “you can go back to the tower if you want”.

“I will stay here, I will protect you” Bucky insisted.

“You will go against Steve?” you asked him.

“I believe I will go against the criminals” he corrected your words “how are you feeling?”

“My body aches but my heart bleeds” you honestly answered his question.

You conversation got interrupted by a knock on the door.

“Bucky, Y/N. You may want to go out we have a visitor” Hela informed you.

You sat down and turned on the lamp beside your bed. Bucky looked puzzled and so where you.

Tony was in your room, staring at your picture that was displayed on your desk.

“Y/N, I’m sorry” he covered his face while sobbing “your dad is a monster”.

body:
“Stephen,” Tony says, the word smushed up between their lips.

Stephen’s body relaxes and pulls Tony into his embrace, gazing at the crazy, brilliant light in his eyes, and he realizes this isn’t just Tony when he’s happy; this is Tony when he’s in love.

@impossiblepersonparadise I hope you have a good day
